edu.biu.scapi.securityLevel

Interface Cpa

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Eav, EncSecLevel, SecurityLevel
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsymAdditiveHomomorphicEnc, AsymmetricEnc, AsymMultiplicativeHomomorphicEnc, AuthenticatedEnc, CBCEnc, Cca1, Cca2, CramerShoupDDHEnc, CTREnc, DamgardJurikEnc, ElGamalEnc, RSAOaepEnc, TPBlumGoldWasserEnc
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcRSAOaep, CramerShoupAbs, CryptoPPRSAOaep, ElGamalAbs, OpenSSLCBCEncRandomIV, OpenSSLCTREncRandomIV, OpenSSLRSAOaep, RSAOaepAbs, ScCBCEncRandomIV, ScCramerShoupDDHOnByteArray, ScCramerShoupDDHOnGroupElement, ScCTREncRandomIV, ScDamgardJurikEnc, ScElGamalKEM, ScElGamalOnByteArray, ScElGamalOnGroupElement, ScEncryptThenMac

    public interface Cpa
extends Eav
    An encryption scheme that is secure in the presence of chosen-plaintext attacks should implement this interface. It is also necessary to specify if such a scheme is Indistinguishable or NonMalleable.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
